vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for a Specific Use Permit for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a general merchandise or food store 3,500 square feet or less use on property zoned an RR-D-1 Regional Retail District with a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay on the south side of Samuell Boulevard, east of North Jim Miller Road
Recommendation of Staff: Approval for a two-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC: Denial without prejudice
Z189-235(PD)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council before opening the public hearing on October 23, 2019, and is scheduled for consideration on January 22, 2020
